pikweb

Class RESTController

  • java.lang.Object
    • pikweb.RESTController

  • @RestController
public class RESTController
extends java.lang.Object
    MVC controller class for the whole app. Maps HTTP requests, communicates with database and generate responses.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/add/user",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String addUser(@RequestParam(value="login",required=true)
                                                                                                 java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="passhash",required=true)
                                                                                                 java.lang.String passhash)
                                                                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        Add new user to database.
        Parameters:
        name - Username
        passhash - Password hash
        Returns:
        200 OK and empty body if all right, error status 465 and Exception message in response body otherwise (e.g. username not unique).
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • loginUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/login/user",
                method=GET)
public UserEntity loginUser(@RequestParam(value="login",required=true)
                                                                                               java.lang.String name,
                                                                                               @RequestParam(value="passhash",required=true)
                                                                                               java.lang.String passhash)
                                                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Check if user with given username and password exists and set session for him if all right.
        Parameters:
        name - Username
        passhash - Password hash
        Returns:
        200 OK and logged user object in response body if credentials are valid, error status 466 and empty response body otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • logoutUser

                method=GET)
public java.lang.String logoutUser(@RequestParam(value="login",required=true)
                                                                                                       java.lang.String name)
                                                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Logout user session if it exists.
        Parameters:
        name - Login of user to logout
        Returns:
        200 OK as confirmation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • deleteUser

        @RequestMapping(value="/delete/user",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String deleteUser(@RequestParam(value="login",required=true)
                                                                                                       java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="passhash",required=true)
                                                                                                       java.lang.String passhash)
                                                                                                throws java.lang.Exception
        Delete user from database if only given password is valid.
        Parameters:
        name - Username of user to delete.
        passhash - Password hash.
        Returns:
        200 OK and empty response body if credentials are valid, error status 467 and Exception message otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
